summary: Encapsulates a userâ€‘defined function as a Prefect flow, exposing configuration for name, version, execution settings, parameter validation, retries, result persistence, and lifecycle callbacks, while providing utilities to run, deploy, serialize, serve, visualize, and customize the workflow.
business_intent: Enable developers to define, configure, and execute reproducible, observable data pipelines and automation tasks within the Prefect orchestration platform.
